TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Series extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties

summary.span: 存储数据点和序列特性。

span.span: Stores data points and series attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象表示某一数据序列，并存储在类。A object represents a data series and is stored in the class. A存储对象使用类。A stores objects using the class. 它还存储的数据序列的属性。It also stores attributes of the data series. 例如，数据序列都具有 color 特性、 背景图像属性、 背景渐变特性和等。For example, a data series has a color attribute, background image attribute, background gradient attribute, and so forth. 属于一系列的对象还具有其自己的属性。The objects that belong to a series also have their own attributes. 通常情况下，如果相同的属性设置为数据点和其所属的数据系列，数据点属性的优先级。Normally, if the same attribute is set for a data point and the series to which it belongs, the data point attribute has precedence. 一系列则不一定会绘制在图表中;它可以存储用于执行的计算从其创建且然后绘制另一系列的数据点值。A series is not necessarily plotted on a chart; it can store data point values that are used to perform a calculation from which another series is created and then plotted. 例如，系列 A，则会绘制，可能会在一起，添加系列 B 和 C 系列数据点的结果，但两个序列的绘制。For example, Series A, which is plotted, may be the result of adding Series B and Series C data points together, though neither of these series is plotted. 若要绘制对象，属性必须设置的名称为用于绘制序列的对象。In order to draw a object, the property must be set to the name of the object used to plot the series. 创建一系列时，自动分配给对象名为"Default"，或如果"默认"对象不存在图表区集合中的第一个可用的图表区域。When a series is created, it is automatically assigned to the object named "Default", or to the first available chart area in the chart area collection if the "Default" object does not exist. 若要禁用的一系列显示时，将设置其属性设置为零长度字符串。To disable the display of a series, set its property to a zero-length string. 属性确定将用于绘制此序列中，如果进行绘制的图表类型。The property determines the type of chart that will be used to plot this series, if it is drawn.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: name
param.span: 将创建的 对象的名称。

span.span: The name of the object that will be created.

param.span: 该名称必须为唯一名称，否则将引发异常。

span.span: This must be a unique name, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

summary.span: 使用指定的系列名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。This constructor can be used to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 这一系列才能够存储具有一个 Y 值的对象。This series is only capable of storing objects that have one Y-value. 如果具有多个 Y 值的数据点添加到此序列，则将引发异常。If a data point that has multiple Y-values is added to this series, an exception will be thrown. 若要在运行时创建一系列，使用方法。To create a series at run time, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, int32 yValues) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, yValues As Integer)

param.name: name
param.span: 将创建的 对象的名称。

span.span: The name of the object that will be created.

param.name: yValues
param.span: 属于此系列的 对象最多可拥有的 Y 值数。

span.span: The maximum number of Y-values allowed for the objects that belong to this series.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称和最大数目的 Y 值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and maximum number of Y values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 这一系列将仅能够存储没有通过设置最大的多个 Y 值的对象`yValues`参数。This series will only be able to store objects that do not have more Y-values than the maximum set by the `yValues` parameter. 如果你添加具有比最大集的多个 Y 值的数据点，则将引发异常。If you add a data point that has more Y-values than the set maximum, an exception will be thrown. 若要创建对象在运行时，`Add`和`Insert`还可以使用方法的序列集合属性。To create a object at run time, the `Add` and `Insert` methods of the Series collection property can also be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPointCustomProperties ^ EmptyPointStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPointCustomProperties ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPointCustomProperties ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标记为空的点的绘制样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing style of points marked as empty.

value.span: 对象。

span.span: A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定标记为空，例如，在的边框颜色、 标记映像、 背景色或图像和等中的点的绘制样式。The property determines the drawing style of points marked as empty, for example, in the border color, in the marker images, background color or images, and so forth. 某些属性才适用于特定的图表类型。Certain properties are only applicable for specific chart types. 例如，属性不适用于折线图中，但适用于的面积图。For example, the property does not apply to line charts, but does apply to an area chart. 若要显示映像，该值指示空点，请使用和属性，而不属性。To display an image that indicates an empty point, use the and properties, and not the property. 属性确定空点的轴标签。The property determines the axis label for empty points. 请注意，对于堆积的图表类型，轴标签确定通过已设置此属性在第一个绘制序列的属性。Note that for stacked chart types, the axis label is determined by the property of the first plotted series that has this property set. 数据点可以将手动标记为一个空通过设置属性`true`。Data points can be manually marked as an empty by setting the property to `true`. 或者，其中一个`InsertEmptyPoints`中的方法类可以用于检查是否有缺少的数据和是否丢失的数据点插入空点。Alternatively, one of the `InsertEmptyPoints` methods in the class can be used to check for missing data and insert empty points if a data point is missing. > [!NOTE] > 在行类型图表的情况下连接到空点的行的线条颜色由属性设置。In the case of line-type charts, the line color for lines that connect to an empty point is determined by the property setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，指示序列在呈现的图表上是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the series will be visible on the rendered chart.

value.span: 如果这些序列在该呈现的图表上为可见，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the series will be visible on the rendered chart; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置一个值，该值确定序列是否在呈现上可见。Gets or sets a value that determines if the series will be visible on the rendered .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsXValueIndexed { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，指示数据点索引是否用于 X 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether data point indices will be used for the X-values.

value.span: 如果属于此序列的数据点索引用于 X 值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the indices of data points that belong to the series will be used for X-values; if they will not.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列中的所有数据点都使用顺序索引，并且如果此属性是`true`然后而不考虑其关联的 X 值将按顺序绘制数据点。All data points in a series use sequential indices, and if this property is `true` then data points will be plotted sequentially, regardless of their associated X-values. 这意味着，将没有"缺失"的数据点。This means that there will be no "missing" data points. 例如，假设一系列具有 X 值 1、 2 和 4 中有三个 （3） 数据点。For example, assume there are three (3) data points in a series having X-values of 1, 2 and 4. 如果此属性为`false`，会在 x 轴的位置标记为"3"缺少一个数据点。If this property was `false`, there would be a data point missing at the X-axis location labeled "3". 但是，如果将此属性设置为`true`、 三个数据点将绘制在点 1、 2 和 4，按顺序，并且会有任何缺少的数据点。However, if you set this property to `true`, the three data points will be plotted at points 1, 2, and 4, sequentially, and there will be no missing data point. 标记为"3"的 x 轴位置不会在图表上出现。The X-axis location labeled "3" will not appear on the chart. 你不想让你知道你将没有数据，如周末间隔缺少数据点，这非常有用。This is useful when you do not want to have missing data points for intervals that you know you will not have data for, such as weekends. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您要显示多个序列和至少一个序列使用索引的 X 值，则所有的序列必须对齐-这就是，具有相同数目的数据点-和相应的点必须具有相同的 X 值。If you are displaying multiple series and at least one series uses indexed X-values, then all series must be aligned—that is, have the same number of data points—and the corresponding points must have the same X-values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Legend { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与 对象关联的系列的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the series associated with the object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示 对象的名称。

span.span: A value that represents the name of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时和运行的时，将在添加一系列，请时自动分配给默认对象。When a series is added at both design time and run time, it is automatically assigned to the default object. 如果您不希望在图例中显示的序列，将此属性设置为零长度字符串，或者设置属性`false`。If you do not want the series shown in a legend, set this property to a zero-length string, or set the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerStep { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定显示数据点标记的频率。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 一个 值，该值确定显示数据点标记的频率。

span.span: An value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 默认值为 1（一）。

span.span: The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定用于显示标记的频率。The property specifies the frequency with which markers are displayed. 例如，如果将此属性设置为二 （2)，每个其他数据点将使用一个标记。For example, if you set this property to two (2), every other data point will use a marker. 如果使用启用标记时，才使用此属性属性。This property is only used if markers are enabled using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Name { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的唯一名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示数据序列的唯一名称。

span.span: A value that represents the unique name of the data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据序列的名称必须是唯一的;否则将引发异常。The name of a data series must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此属性可以用作索引器，当你检索时对象对象。This property can be used as the indexer when you retrieve a object from the object. 如果此属性设置为零长度字符串，则将引发异常。If this property is set to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartColorPalette Palette { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartColorPalette get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartColorPalette value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ColorPaletteEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的调色板。

span.span: Gets or sets the color palette of a object.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定了数据系列的调色板。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines the palette for the data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板用于自动将颜色分配给数据元素，如果数据点本身不具有分配给他们的颜色，并且数据数据点所属的对象还没有分配的颜色。A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them and if the data object that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果任何系列或数据点颜色显式指定，使用的颜色依赖于图表类型的图表控件调色板或系列调色板，如果指定了一个。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the Chart control palette or Series palette, if one is specified. 请参阅下的表以了解更多详细信息：See the table below for further details: |图表类型Chart Type|使用系列调色板？Series Palette Used?|显示的数据点颜色Colors Displayed by Data Points| |----------------|--------------------------|-------------------------------------| |任何形状图 （例如，饼图和圆环图）Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|否No|中使用的第一个可用颜色控件调色板。First available colors used from control palette. 每个数据点的一种颜色。One color per data point.| |除形状图以外的所有图表All charts except shape charts|否No|从第一个可用颜色控件调色板。First available colors from control palette. 每个数据序列的一种颜色。One color per data series.| |任何形状图 （例如，饼图和圆环图）Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|是Yes|中使用的第一个可用颜色调色板。First available colors used from palette. 每个数据点的一种颜色。One color per data point.| |除形状图以外的所有图表All charts except shape charts|是Yes|中使用的第一个可用颜色调色板。First available colors used from palette. 每个数据序列的一种颜色。One color per data series.| 这属性的优先级高于根的属性对象，与数据的显示。This property has precedence over the property of the root object, with respect to the display of data. 注意： 如果`Palette`属性同时和对象设置为无，并且无颜色分配到相关的数据序列/数据点，默认调色板"BrightPastel"或使用。NOTE: If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to None, and no color is assigned to the relevant data series/data points, the default palette "BrightPastel" or is used.

summary.span: 获取 对象。

span.span: Gets a object.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 对象的集合。

span.span: A object that represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合属性，可添加和删除数据点与一系列。The collection property allows you to add and remove data points to a series. 此属性也提供方法和属性，可用于操作此集合，如查找数据点，执行数据绑定和等。This property also provides methods and properties that can be used to manipulate this collection, such as finding data points, performing data-binding, and so forth.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadowOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置序列的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a series.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示序列的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset of the series, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现阴影，请使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致阴影向下和向右移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 负值将导致阴影向上和向左移动。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置一系列的可视特性。The following code example sets the visual attributes of a series. ```vb ' Set series shadow offset Public Sub SetSeriesShadowOffset() Chart1.Series("Default"}.ShadowOffset = 2 End Sub 'SetSeriesVisualAttributes ``` ```csharp // Set series shadow offset public void SetSeriesShadowOffset () { Chart1.Series["Default"].ShadowOffset = 2; } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType XAxisType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置序列的 X 轴类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the X-axis type of the series.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列使用主 X 轴还是辅助 X 轴。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines if the series uses the primary or secondary X-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为所有图表除水平方向图表之外的类型，如条形图和堆积会条形图，例如饼图、 圆环图、 漏斗图和棱锥图的形状图，主 x 轴始终是较低的轴，辅助轴将上方的轴的。For all chart types except horizontally oriented charts such as bar and stacked bar charts, and shape charts such as pie, doughnut, funnel and pyramid charts, the primary X-axis is always the lower axis and the secondary axis is the upper axis. 为条形图和堆积条形图表，主 x 轴是左的轴，辅助 x 轴是正确的轴。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary X-axis is the left axis, and the secondary X-axis is the right axis. 如果使用辅助 x 轴绘制的数据，则必须使用属性来设置轴属性，而不属性。When data is plotted using the secondary X-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ XValueMember { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于将数据绑定到系列的 X 值的图表数据源成员列。

span.span: Gets or sets the member column of the chart data source used to data bind to the X-value of the series.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性接受成员列的名称或成员列的序号值。This property accepts either the name of the member column or the ordinal value of the member column.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType XValueType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置沿 X 轴绘制的值类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the value types plotted along the X-axis.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列存储的 X 值数据的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of X-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定由序列存储的数据类型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 将此属性设置为以允许要作为输入的 X 值值，而不是作为。Set this property to to allow the X-value to be entered as a value, and not as a . 作为.NET Framework 在内部存储日期和时间值值。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values. 对于如此和属性对象。The same holds true for the and properties of objects. `IntervalType`在轴标签、 刻度线和网格类中找到的属性确定的间隔类型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. > [!NOTE] > 若要正确应用生成从数据点 X 值，使用的轴标签的格式属性，此属性必须设置为。To correctly apply a format to axis labels that are generated from data point X-values, using the property, this property must be set to . 此属性也可用来确定 X 值绑定到的数据类型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the X-values are bound.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType YAxisType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置序列的 Y 轴类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y-axis type of a series.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列使用主 Y 轴还是辅助 Y 轴。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines if a series uses the primary or secondary Y-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定使用主密钥或辅助 y 轴绘制一系列。The property determines if a series is plotted using the primary or secondary Y-axis. 为所有图表除饼图、 圆环图、 范围条形图之外的类型，条形图和堆积会条形图表，主 y 轴是左侧的垂直轴，辅助轴是右垂直轴的。For all chart types except pie, doughnut, range bar, bar and stacked bar charts, the primary Y-axis is the left vertical axis, and the secondary axis is the right vertical axis. 为条形图和堆积条形图表，主轴是较低的水平轴，辅助 y 轴是上方的水平轴。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary axis is the lower horizontal axis, and the secondary Y-axis is the upper horizontal axis. 如果使用辅助 y 轴绘制的数据，则必须使用属性来设置轴属性，而不属性。When data is plotted using the secondary Y-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ YValueMembers { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于将数据绑定到序列 Y 值的图表数据源的成员列。

span.span: Gets or sets member columns of the chart data source used to bind data to the Y-values of the series.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性接受一个包含名称或列的序号值的以逗号分隔字符串。This property accepts a comma separated string that contains the names or ordinal values of the columns.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int YValuesPerPoint { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 中的 对象最多可拥有的 Y 值数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of Y-values that objects in a are allowed to have.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示允许序列中的数据点具有的 Y 值最大数目。

span.span: An value that represents the maximum number of Y-values that the data points in a series are allowed to have.

value.span: 默认值为 1（一）。

span.span: The default value to one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你添加具有多个 Y 值的对象不是此属性指定，将忽略多余的 Y 值。If you add a object that has more Y-values than this property specifies, the excess Y-values will be ignored. 所需正确显示图表的 Y 值的数目取决于选择的图表类型。The number of Y-values that are required to properly display a chart depends on the chart type selected.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType YValueType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置序列所存储的数据点中的 Y 值数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of Y-value data in the data points stored by a series.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列所存储的 Y 值数据类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of Y-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定由序列存储的数据类型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 此属性的值通常设置为或。The value of this property is normally set to either or . `IntervalType`在轴标签、 刻度线和网格类中找到的属性确定的间隔类型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. 此属性也可用来确定 Y 值绑定到的数据类型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the Y-values are bound. 它是可能要绘制为数据点的值的日期表达式，但很少这么做。It is possible to plot date expressions as the values of data points, though this is rarely done. 如果将此属性设置为，然后作为输入 Y 值可以值，而不是作为。If you set this property to , the Y-value can then entered as a value, and not as a . 作为.NET Framework 在内部存储日期和时间值值。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values.
